All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AddEnquiry
The AddEnquiry class is to hold the logic for adding an enquiry made by a student
ADM
A class that implements Faculty.
App
The ApplicationContext class is a static class that denotes static variables that last throughout application lifetime such as the logged-in user (as there is only one instance of it) and other useful static variables.
AuthenticationController
The AuthenticationController provides functionalities to authenticate whether the user's input details are valid and authenticated.
BaseDaoImpl
The BaseDaoImpl abstract class provides the basic functionalities for reading and saving to a file, while providing abstract methods that subclasses can implement to do their own saving and reading.
BaseSerializer
The BaseSerializer class stores the necessary data for sub serializers for the text format.
BaseViewModel
An abstract class that all view models should inherit from for view model functionalities
Camp
The Camp class is an entity class that can be accessed by both Staff and Students to access any relevant information to this camp
CampApplication
The CampApplication class is the starting class of this application.
CampCommitteeSuggestionView
The CampCommitteeSuggestionView class contains the necessary UI elements to display camp committee members suggestions
CampCommitteeSuggestionViewModel
The CampCommitteeSuggestionViewModel holds all the logic and necessary Ui elements for suggestions

The CampCommitteeView class contains the necessary UI elements to display what the student can do when hes a camp committee of that camp
CampCommitteeViewModel
The CampCommitteeViewModel holds all the logic and necessary UI elements for CampCommittee
CampDao
The CampDao interface provides operations that follow the CRUD operations for persistent data storage.
CampDaoImpl
The CampDaoImpl implements the functions of CampDao using the DAO Design Pattern.
CampDeserializer
The CampDeserializer class deserializes a hashmap of parsed data a list of Camp objects to be used.
CampFilterByAttendees
The CampFilterByAttendees class provides an implementation of filtering camps by attendees
CampFilterByCommittee
The CampFilterByCommittee class provides an implementation of filtering camps by committee
CampFilterByCreated
The CampFilterByCreated class provides an implementation of filtering the camps of the person who created it
CampFilterByLocation
The CampFilterByLocation class provides an implementation of filtering camps by location
CampFilterByStaff
This class provides implementation of filtering the camps by students, allowing students to see particular camps.
CampFilterByStudent
The SuggestionDeserializer class deserializes a hashmap of parsed data a list of Student objects to be used.
CampFilterOperation
The CampFilterOperation is an interface that allows filtering options for camps to easily extend from this class
CampInfo
The CampInfo class holds information about all the information a camp can have
CampManager
The CampManager class holds all logic for the creation and handling of camps and is the intermediary between the dao and the app logic.
CampOperations
The CampOperations interface provides an abstraction layer to extend any number of operations to use
CampSerializer
The CampSerializer class serializes a list of Camp objects into an array list of strings ready to be written into a text file of choice.
CampSortOperation
The CampSortOperation is an interface that allows filtering options for camps to easily extend from this class
CamsApp
The CamsApp abstracts the entire application into a simple run function.
ChangePasswordView
The ChangePasswordView class contains the necessary UI elements to display the change password UI
CreateCamp
The CreateCamp class holds the logic for creating a camp
DatabaseQuery
A wrapper class to denote a database query, similar to a pair of an objects
DataFile
The DataFile class is a base type abstract class that stores the necessary attributes to a file like filePath that all file types should inherit from
DateRangeValidator
The DataRangeValidator provides functions to check whether a given date is in between two dates
DeleteCamp
The DeleteCamp class holds the logic for deleting a camp
DeleteEnquiry
The DeleteEnquiry class holds the logic for deleting a given enquiry in the enquiries database
DeleteStudentEnquiry
The DeleteStudentEnquiry class holds the logic for deleting a given enquiry filtered for a given student name in the enquiry database
DirectoryUtility
The Directory Utility class provides all paths for all data files such that there are hard coded paths in our code
DTFormatter
The DTFormatter class formats date times to the local Singapore context.
EditCampDetailsView
The EditCampDetailsView class contains the necessary UI elements to display the necessary operations to edit camp details.
EditCampDetailsViewModel
The EditCampDetailsViewModel class handles the EditCampDetailsView 's logics and present the relevant operations for Staff to edit the camp details.

A class that implements Faculty.

The IManagement context provides an abstraction layer for user management.

The InputHandler class holds all the input functionalities such that no unnecessary scanners are created and used in the codebase.
IReadable
An interface that can be realized by readers to force them to have the read function
IView
A simple interface that all views would inherit from to render a particular text on the console display.
IViewModel
The IViewModel interface abstracts the functions and provides a state machine like structure for a view manager to carry out state transitions

An interface that can be realized by writers to force them to have write functions

TextDataDeserializer
The TextDataDeserializer interface denotes signatures that text-based serializers should implement to deserialize already parsed data.
TextDataFile
The TextDataFile class is a concrete class that is both readable and writable and is a subtype of DataFile.
TextDataParser
The TextDataParser interface allows the parsing of data from an array list of strings, and converts it to a hashmap with the values of header(key) and columns(values).
TextDataReader
The TextDataReader class is a specific class that reads data from a file that is known to contain texts (Strings).
TextDataSerializer
The TextDataSerializer interface denotes functions that subclass serializers should have to serialize a list of objects into an array list of strings ready to be written into a file of choice.
TextDataWriter
The TextDataWriter class is a specific class that writes data into a file that is known to contain text (strings)
UpdateCamp
The UpdateCamp class holds the logic to update a camp in our database
UpdateEnquiry
The UpdatedEnquiry class holds the logic for updating a given enquiry
User
The User class is a base class for all potential parties.
UserManager
The UserManager is the main management of users, providing functions to update users without knowing their real derived types.
ViewManager
The ViewManager class handles the movement between view models like a state machine, ensuring easy transition between view models with error handling.
WithdrawAttendees
The WithdrawAttendees class holds the logic to withdraw an attendee from a camp
